title: Font for headline
content:
I am looking for a good font to use as a headline font while using a completely Sans Serif font in body. Can you suggest some fonts for me?

 [‹ New year's card: circular 2](http://web.archive.org/web/20080515232906/http:/www.typophile.com/node/40115 "Go to previous forum topic") ["Goodie Bag" video blog on Trajan ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080515232906/http:/www.typophile.com/node/40093 "Go to next forum topic")
author: olafurp

comments.content: What body face are you using?
Maybe Hermes by Font Bureau. But it’s so difficult to suggest without view a layout.
